titlestmt.titleproper: Eugene M. Waith Travel Slide Collection
Eugene M. Waith Travel Slide Collection
titlestmt.author: Compiled by Sarah Coe

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Monday April 22, 2019 at 23:00

did.unittitle: Eugene M. Waith Travel Slide Collection
did.abstract: Slides of monuments and scenary on travels to Mexico, Britain, France, the Netherlands, Italy and Greece. Photographer is Eugene M. Waith, emeritus Professor of English Literature at Yale University. No identification on the slides. Minimal identification supplied by accompanying lists.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright has not been transferred to Yale University. Further use of this material may be subject to the copyright laws of the United States (Title 17, United States Code) or to site license or other rights management terms or conditions.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Eugene Waith Travel Slide Collection, Arts Library, Yale University

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Eugene Waith Slide Collection (785 slides) Slides or architecture and scenery were taken by Professor Eugene Waith (English literature, emeritus) during his travels, and donated to the Visual Resources Collection in 1992. Slides of monuments and scenary on travels to Mexico, Britain, France, the Netherlands, Italy and Greece. Photographer is Eugene M. Waith, emeritus Professor of English Literature at Yale University. No identification on the slides. Minimal identification supplied by accompanying lists.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: 785 unlabeled 35 mm color slides in cardboard mounts, arranged in 24 projection cartridges (8 per box).

odd.head: General
odd.p: Mexico, 1963
Locations noted on box: Mexico, Cathedral, Profesa, Guadalupe; Acolman; Teotihuacan; Chapultepek; University City.

odd.head: General
odd.p: Mexico, 1970

Locations noted on box: Heujotzingo, North Portal; Santa MariaTonantzintla; San Francisco de Acatepec; Tlaxcalancingo; Puebla, Cathedral, Compagnia, Casa Alfenique, Cathedral, Rosario Santo Domingo; Tepotzotlan.

odd.head: General
odd.p: Mexico, 1970
Locations noted on box: Uxmal, Pir del Adivino, Las Monjas, Palacio del Gobernador; Las Palomas; Kabah, Arch; Sayil; Xlapak; Labna.

odd.head: General
odd.p: Mexico, 1970
Locations noted on box: Teotihuacan, Citadel, Quetzalcoatl Pyramid, Palace of Quetzal—Butterfly; La Venta Park; Palenque, Temple of Inscriptions, Palacio.

odd.head: General
odd.p: Mexico, 1970
Locations noted on box: Palenque, Palacio, Conde & Norte, Templo del Conde, Norte, Aquaduct—Pool, Templo de la Cruz Foliada, Templo del Sol, Templo de la Cruz; Uxmal, Pir del Adivino.

odd.head: General
odd.p: Mexico, 1963
Locations noted on box: Monte Alban, Observatory; Mitla; Tlacolula; Tlacochauaya, Jaime; Cuilapan.

odd.head: General
odd.p: Mexico, 1970

Locations noted on box: Chichen Itza, Castillo, Venus Platform, Temple of Warriors, Chac Mool, Tzompantli, Eagles and Tigers, Cenote, Mil Columnas, Mercado, Jeugo de Pelota, Jaguars, Caracol, Iglesia.

odd.head: General
odd.p: France, 1964 Location noted on box: Chantilly.

odd.head: General
odd.p: Italy, 1965
Locations noted on box: Pomposa; Ravenna, San Vitale, San Apollinare in Classe; Modena; Parma; Felino; Torrechiara; Cremona; Fidenza; Piacenza, Galico, Duomo; Castell' Arquato.

odd.head: General
odd.p: Italy, 1965
Locations noted on box: Venice, Ca d'Oro, Rialto, Colleone at Zampalo, Scuola San Marco, Saint Mark's, San Giorgio Maggiore; Torcello; Burano; Mazzorbo; Murano, Santa Maria & Donato.

odd.head: General
odd.p: Netherlands and Britain, 1968
Locations noted on box: Alkmaar; Polder; Afsluitdijk; Eukhuizen (East India House); Delta Works; Stratford; Clifford Chambers.

odd.head: General
odd.p: Netherlands, 1968
Locations noted on box: The Hague?, Vijuer, Bennenhof, Riddeizaal, Koekamp, Gemeentemuseum; Rotterdam, Boymans, Het Park, From Euromast, Park.

odd.head: General
odd.p: Netherlands, 1968
Locations noted on box: Amsterdam, Begijnhof, Ande Kerk, Zuidenkerk, Westukerk, Prinzengricht?, Kuidukerk, Flerrengricht?

odd.head: General
odd.p: Netherlands, 1968

Locations noted on box: Haarlem, Hofje van Teyler, Gravensteenbrug, Waag, St. Bavo, Groot Heiligland, Grote Markt (Uleeshal?), St. Bavo, Gravensteenbrug, Amsterdamse Poort; Hoge Velisive; Delft, Nieume Kerk?, Prinsenhof, Oude Kerk, Boterbrug, Oude Delft.

odd.head: General
odd.p: Britain, 1964

Locations noted on box: Stratford; Trinity Church; Mary Arden; Alveston Manor; Evesham; Tewkesbury; Stanway House; Warwick/Leycester Hosp.; Chipping Camden; Betw. U. and L. Swell; Lower Swell; Upper Slaughter; Lower Slaughter.

odd.head: General
odd.p: Netherlands and Britain, 1968
Locations noted on box: Rotterdam Harbor; London, Seim (?) House, Gardening Centre; Hayward Gallery etc.; On the Thames; Greenwich; Saint Martins in the Fields; University of Sarssen.

odd.head: General
odd.p: Britain, 1964
Locations noted on box: Cotswalds/Lower Slaughter; Coughton Court; Anne Hathway; Chastleton House; Stanton (?); Brienon.

odd.head: General
odd.p: Britain, 1968

Locations noted on box: Brighton Pavilion; Ewelme; Oxford—fr. Sheldonian, New College, Magdalen, ?, Christ Church, Merton; Cotswolds; Spelsbury; Swinbrook; Northleigh; Steeple Aston; St. Mary's Blorcham between Willersey and Chipping Camden; Stratford.

odd.head: General
odd.p: Greece and Britain, no date (1960s)
Locations noted on box: Rhodes; Lindos; Patmos; Mikonos; London; Penshurst.

odd.head: General
odd.p: Italy and Greece, no date
Locations noted on box: Segesta; Erice; Selimento; Agrigento; Syracusa; Paestum; Semion (?); Athens; Daphni.

odd.head: General
odd.p: Greece, 1965
Locations noted on box: Athens, Sacred Way, Propylaea, Parthenon, Erectheum, Acropolis from Philopop., Theseum, Metamorphosis Sotiri, Micio Metropolis; Piraeus; Hegina; Peloponneses coast; Poros.

odd.head: General
odd.p: Greece, 1965
Locations noted on box: Bassae; Methoue Kastro, Pylos General View, Sunrise, Sunset; Nauplia; Bourdyi (?); Palamidi; Treasury of Athens; Tyrius; Epidaurus; Nemea.

odd.head: General
odd.p: Greece, no date
Locations noted on box: Kaisariani; Plaka; Corinth; Tirins; Nauplion; Mistra; Olympia; Delphi.

odd.head: General
odd.p: Greece, 1965
Locations noted on box: Hydra—Neraida; Port; Swimming; Miranda, Streets; Coundouriotis; Poros; Seascape; Temple at Sernion; Delphi—Apollo, Tholos, Theater, Folks.
